Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • GameManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Thread
    Game manager class, extends the thread class to make it a runnable object

      • getLatestUpdates

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getLatestUpdates()
        Get a list of all the update commands since the last update
        Returns:
        A list of update commands

      • pushUpdate

        public void pushUpdate(java.lang.String update)
        Push an update to the game manager, also checks that the command is valid and only processes changes to the game state if the game isn't paused
        Parameters:
        update - the update command and any extra relevant data

      • getCommand

        public java.lang.String getCommand(java.lang.String message)
        Get the command from an update message
        Parameters:
        message - the update message being parsed
        Returns:
        The command that the update message starts with

      • getValue

        public java.lang.String getValue(java.lang.String message,
                                 java.lang.String key)
        Get a value (as a string) from an update message
        Parameters:
        message - the update message being parsed
        key - the key name of the value that needs to be obtained from the update message
        Returns:
        The value of the key value pair obtained from the update message, blank if no such key exists in the message

      • checkValidCommand

        public boolean checkValidCommand(java.lang.String message)
        Check if the update message is valid or not
        Parameters:
        message - the update message being parsed
        Returns:
        True if the message is valid, false if not

      • saveGame

        public void saveGame(java.lang.String filename)
        Save the current game to the given file by writing the entire update list
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file, excluding the .txt extension

      • loadGame

        public void loadGame(java.lang.String filename)
        Load a save file by reading in the list of updates and simulating the game up to that point
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file, excluding the .txt extension
